scripts.build: del dist\index.html && del dist\index.*.js* && parcel build webroot/index.html && robocopy dist R:\ItchioBuilds\GardenFrantic\dist /s /e || powershell -Command "(Get-Content R:\ItchioBuilds\GardenFrantic\dist\index.html) -replace 'src=\"/', 'src=\"./' | Out-File -encoding ASCII R:\ItchioBuilds\GardenFrantic\dist\index.html"
